title: Can't see gold text when killing minions
body: I cant see the gold text when i kill minions. I initiated full repair and the gold box is checked in my interface settings ingame and still cant see gold text when killing minions.

replies.body: Sometimes need to change the interface setting in game, and client to work, not one or the other
What do you mean by that?
Means change gold text showing in both client settings, and then go into a game and change it there too
I already did but still can't see the gold text when killing minions
Buy a cull feel good about it. Gold was moved to above your head instead of where minions are this patch, not sure if bug or not though.
oh ok... ill check it out later, tnx for the help ^^
